C

checkForFile(String) - Method in class FileRetrieveServer
Called by the processConnection() method, checks if the client requested file exists and returns a string containing its contents if it finds one.
client - Variable in class FileRetrieveClient
Client's socket which will be used to connect to the Server's socket
ClientTest - Class in <Unnamed>
Driver class for FileRetrieveClient.
ClientTest() - Constructor for class ClientTest
 
closeConnection() - Method in class FileRetrieveClient
called when the message from the server is "endit" (which is triggered by the client sending the server the same term).
closeConnection() - Method in class FileRetrieveServer
Closes the connection between the server and client by first closing the ObjectOutputStream, inputOutputStream, and Socket
connection - Variable in class FileRetrieveServer
Defines the socket Object which is used to pass and receive the client and servers IP and port numbers
connectToServer() - Method in class FileRetrieveClient
Attempts to connect the client's socket to the server socket.
